Detailed Description

MGAttribedGel is an abstract class which provides function interfaces of MGGroup and MGObject that have MGAppearance.

MGAttribedGel does not have any member data.************

Member Function Documentation

virtual MGAppearance* MGAttribedGel::appearance (  )  [pure virtual]

Get the MGAppearance pointer in this group.

If not defined, null will be returned.

Implemented in MGGroup, and MGObject.

Process of draw or render attributes.

Test if this group is attributed as no display.

virtual void MGAttribedGel::set_GLattrib ( MGGLAttrib *  attr  )  [virtual]

Set the attribute in this list.

attr must be a newed object, and the ownership will be transfered to this MGAppearance.
